DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the concordance of RAS mutation detection between the results obtained from circulating tumor DNA and those obtained with the "standard" method (testing from tumor tissue).
DOC.brief_title: RAS Mutation Testing in the Circulating Blood of Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
